function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemics leading to increases in the Gini coefficient and inequality","Impact":"Worsened inequality and economic disparities","Mitigation":"Investing in workforce training and education","Technologies":"Automation, robotics, AI","People":"Low-skilled workers, mid-level workers","Owner":"Government, employers, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Uneven impact of robots on workers with different skill levels","Impact":"Reinforced inequality dynamics","Mitigation":"Investing in reskilling and upskilling programs","Technologies":"Automation, robotics, AI","People":"Low-skilled workers, high-skilled workers","Owner":"Employers, educational institutions, government"},{"Description":"Dependent on country fixed effects and global business cycle","Impact":"Potential for biased estimation results","Mitigation":"Sensitivity analysis, robustness checks","Technologies":"Statistical analysis, econometric modeling","People":"Research analysts, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government"}]}
